title: Data Migration from Legacy System
description: A new customer needs help migrating their data from a competitor's product.

tasks.description: Analyze the data export from the legacy system to understand its structure and format.
tasks.expected_outcome: Consultant maps the fields from the old system to the fields in the new product.

tasks.description: Write and run transformation scripts to clean and reformat the legacy data to match the required import format.
tasks.expected_outcome: Consultant successfully prepares the data for migration.

tasks.description: Perform the data import into the customer's new account.
tasks.expected_outcome: The data is successfully imported into the product.

tasks.description: Run validation checks to ensure all data was migrated accurately and completely.
tasks.expected_outcome: Consultant verifies the integrity of the migrated data with the customer.
